00023 #include <vect_impl.h>
00024 
00025 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur_ni_destructeur(vect_impl,"vect_impl",Objet_U);
00026 Sortie& vect_impl::printOn(Sortie& s) const
00027 {
00028   int i=sz;
00029   s<<sz<<space;
00030   for(i=0; i<sz; i++)
00031     s<<data[i].valeur()<<space;
00032   assert(sz>=0);
00033   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00034   return s<<finl;
00035 }
00036 Entree& vect_impl::readOn(Entree& s)
00037 {
00038   int i;
00039   s >> i;
00040   dimensionner(i);
00041   for(i=0; i<sz; i++)
00042     s>>data[i].valeur();
00043   assert(sz>=0);
00044   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00045   return s;
00046 }
00047 Entree& vect_impl::lit(Entree& s)
00048 {
00049   int i;
00050   s >> i;
00051   dimensionner_force(i);
00052   for(i=0; i<sz; i++)
00053     s>>data[i].valeur();
00054   assert(sz>=0);
00055   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00056   return s;
00057 }

00059 //
00060 //! methhode surcharge par les classes filles pour fournir la bonne<br>instance aux constructeurs au readOn....
00061 Objet_U* vect_impl::cree_une_instance() const
00062 {
00063   Cerr<<"cree_une_instance() must be redefined in "<<que_suis_je()<<finl;
00064   exit();
00065   throw;
00066   return cree_une_instance() ;
00067 }
00068 /* VECT constructors */
00069 vect_impl::vect_impl() : sz(0), data(0) {}
00070 void vect_impl::build_vect_impl(int i)
00071 {
00072   sz=i;
00073   if(i==0) data=0;
00074   else
00075     {
00076       data=0;
00077       dimensionner_force(i);
00078       if(!data)
00079         {
00080           Cerr << "Allocation is not possible : " << finl;
00081           exit();
00082         }
00083     }
00084   assert(sz>=0);
00085   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00086 }
00087 /* Constructor by copy for VECT */
00088 vect_impl::vect_impl(const vect_impl& avect_impl)
00089   : Objet_U(avect_impl),sz(avect_impl.sz), data(new DerObjU[avect_impl.sz])
00090 {
00091   if(!data)
00092     {
00093       Cerr << "Allocation is not possible : " << finl;
00094       exit();
00095     }
00096   int i=sz;
00097   if(i==0)
00098     {
00099       delete[] data;
00100       data=0;
00101     }
00102   else while(i--)
00103       {
00104         (data[i])=(avect_impl[i]);
00105       }
00106   assert(sz>=0);
00107   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00108 }
00109 /* VECT destructor */
00110 vect_impl::~vect_impl()
00111 {
00112   reset();
00113   assert (data==0) ;
00114 }
00115 /* VECT operator= */
00116 vect_impl& vect_impl::operator=(const vect_impl& avect_impl)
00117 {
00118   if (this==&(ref_cast(vect_impl,avect_impl)))
00119     return *this;
00120   if(data)
00121     {
00122       reset();
00123     }
00124   sz=avect_impl.sz;
00125   if(sz)
00126     {
00127       data = new DerObjU[sz];
00128       if(!data)
00129         {
00130           Cerr << "Allocation is not possible : " << finl;
00131           exit();
00132         }
00133       int i=sz;
00134       while(i--)
00135         {
00136           data[i]=avect_impl[i];
00137         }
00138     }
00139   else data=0;
00140   assert(sz>=0);
00141   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00142   return *this;
00143 }
00144 /* Size a VECT to i elements */
00145 void vect_impl::dimensionner(int i)
00146 {
00147   if(sz==i) return;
00148   if(sz!=0)
00149     {
00150       Cerr << "WARNING : dimensionner method of a vect_impl" << finl;
00151       Cerr << "old size : " << sz << finl;
00152       Cerr << "new size : " << i << finl;
00153     }
00154   assert(data==0);
00155   Objet_U* ptr_inst=cree_une_instance();
00156   const Objet_U& une_instance=*ptr_inst;
00157   sz=i;
00158   data = new DerObjU[i];
00159   if(!data)
00160     {
00161       Cerr << "Allocation is not possible. " << finl;
00162       exit();
00163     }
00164   for (int ii=0; ii<sz; ii++)
00165     data[ii]=une_instance;
00166   assert(sz>=0);
00167   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00168   delete ptr_inst;
00169 }
00170 /* Empty then size a VECT to i elements */
00171 void vect_impl::dimensionner_force(int i)
00172 {
00173   if(data)
00174     {
00175       reset();
00176     }
00177   Objet_U* ptr_inst=cree_une_instance();
00178   const Objet_U& une_instance=*ptr_inst;
00179   sz=i;
00180   data = new DerObjU[i];
00181   if(!data)
00182     {
00183       Cerr << "Allocation is not possible. " << finl;
00184       exit();
00185     }
00186   for (int ii=0; ii<sz; ii++)
00187     data[ii]=une_instance;
00188   assert(sz>=0);
00189   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00190   delete ptr_inst;
00191 
00192 }
00193 /* Empty a VECT (delete data and reset size to 0) */
00194 void vect_impl::reset()
00195 {
00196   if (data)
00197     {
00198       delete [] data;
00199       data=0;
00200       sz=0;
00201     }
00202   assert(sz==0);
00203 }
00204 /* Add a new element to the VECT */
00205 vect_impl& vect_impl::add(const Objet_U& data_to_add)
00206 {
00207   DerObjU* tempo;
00208   int new_size=sz+1;
00209   tempo = new DerObjU[new_size];
00210   for(int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00211     (tempo[i]).deplace(data[i]);
00212   if (data) delete [] data;
00213   data=tempo;
00214   sz=new_size;
00215   data[sz-1]= data_to_add;
00216   assert(sz>=0);
00217   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00218   return *this;
00219 }
00220 /* Append a VECT to a VECT */
00221 vect_impl& vect_impl::add(const vect_impl& data_to_add)
00222 {
00223   int sz_data_to_add = data_to_add.size();
00224   DerObjU* tempo;
00225   int new_size=sz+sz_data_to_add;
00226   tempo = new DerObjU[new_size];
00227   for(int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00228     (tempo[i]).deplace( data[i]);
00229   if (data) delete [] data;
00230   data=tempo;
00231   sz=new_size;
00232   for(int j=0; j<sz_data_to_add; j++)
00233     {
00234       data[sz-sz_data_to_add+j]= data_to_add[j];
00235     }
00236   assert(sz>=0);
00237   if(sz) assert(data!=0);
00238   return *this;
00239 }
